# Welcome and Introductions

![](images/adc-courses-banner.png)
In addition to individual workshops, the Arctic Data Center also teaches three week-long workshops throughout the year. These courses cover the fundamentals of open data sharing, reproducible research techniques, ethical data use and reuse, and scalable computing for reusing large data sets.
